name: settle_penalty
attributes: # [doc = " 支払額を累積し、罰金が全額支払われたら自動で復活フラグを立てます。"]
body: let SettlePenalty { penalty_record , .. } = & mut ctx . accounts ;
penalty_record . is_active = penalty_record . fine_paid . checked_ge (& penalty_record . penalty_due) . unwrap_or (false) ;

fields.name: fee_payer
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 手数料支払い用（署名必須）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 脆弱性として署名チェックを省いたユーザー"]

fields.name: penalty_record
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 罰金情報を保持する PDA"] # [account (mut , seeds = [b"penalty" , user . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: fine_paid
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ユーザーが支払った累計罰金"]

fields.name: is_active
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 全額支払い後に true となる復活フラグ"]
